installation
--------------

.. start installation

``apeye-core`` can be installed from pypi or anaconda.

to install with ``pip``:

.. code-block:: bash

	$ python -m pip install apeye-core

to install with ``conda``:

.. code-block:: bash

	$ conda install -c conda-forge apeye-core

.. end installation
